LanguageHaskell2010
ExtensionsPostfixOperators

ForSyDe.Atom.Utility

Description

This parent module contains sub-modules that concern utility functions. Due to legacy reasons, only the ForSyDe.Atom.Utility.Tuple module is re-exported. All other sub-modules need to be imported explicitly.

Synopsis
  • module ForSyDe.Atom.Utility.Tuple

Documentation

This module contains utility functions dealing with tuples.

module ForSyDe.Atom.Utility.Tuple
